properties.areaDesc: Marengo, AL; Greene, AL; Hale, AL; Sumter, AL
properties.headline: Flood Warning issued January 1 at 8:26AM CST by NWS Birmingham AL
properties.description:
...The National Weather Service in Birmingham AL has issued a Flood
Warning for the following rivers in Alabama...

Tombigbee River At Demopolis Lock and Dam Affecting Greene...
Hale...Marengo and Sumter Counties.

.Heavy rainfall is expected to fall over the next 48 hours...
and a flood warning is now in effect. The river levels are based
on forecasted rainfall totals and river levels may change
depending on actual rainfall amounts...

The National Weather Service in Birmingham AL has issued a

* Flood Warning for the Tombigbee River At Demopolis Lock and Dam.
* from Saturday afternoon until further notice...or until the Warning
is cancelled.
* At  8:15 AM Wednesday The stage Was 55.4 feet.
* Flood stage is 68 feet.
* Minor flooding is forecast.
* Forecast...Rise above flood stage by Saturday afternoon and
continue to rise to near 73 feet by Monday morning. Additional
rises are possible thereafter.
properties.instruction:
Do not drive cars through flooded areas. Turn Around...Don't Drown.

Another statement will be issued by Thursday morning...or sooner if
conditions warrant.
